name: Customised Bib For Babies in 2 SIZES 19*16 & 24*20 CM
description: Baby bib will keep your baby’s clothing clean. The reinforced Velcro closure makes this one easy-on and easy-off for mom and dad, but just tricky enough so the little one won’t keep taking it off and throwing it on the floor. This is an easy choice for any baby gift — no sizing necessary! Cute Personalized bib for your precious little baby to wear. Imagine them with a funny saying on the bib they’re wearing, a picture of his/her parents, or a cartoon character he/she really likes. Keep them safe, clean and one of a kind with this Personalized baby bib! The Customized baby bib will be soft and of top quality for the care of your little one. So what are you waiting for? Personalize your own customized bibs. 100% Soft polyester fabric | Llightweight Reinforced Velcro closure Extra soft combed ring-spun cotton for baby’s sensitive skin One size fits most (up to 36 months) Fully processed and printed in India (Made in India)
